article_title: Robert Pittenger and challengers debate his Washington experience
article_text:
In race for Republican nomination in 9th Congressional District, it’s two outsiders vs. insider

With little disagreement on issues, candidates focus on votes for budget bill, debt ceiling

Low turnout expected for June 7 primary for recently redrawn district

article_metadata.news-keywords: Robert Pittenger, Mark Harris, Todd Johnson, North Carolina's 9th congressional district, Republican primary, Sue Myrick
article_metadata.description: U.S. Rep. Robert Pittenger’s two challengers in the June 7 Republican primary are busily portraying him as a Washington insider. They say he talks like a conservative back in the 9th district but doesn’t always vote like one on the House floor.
article_metadata.title: Robert Pittenger and challengers debate his Washington experience | The Charlotte Observer
